coverage:ltng:cover.description: should be used as a replacement for force:lightning:test:run that also retrieves coverage information

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

coverage:ltng:instrument.description: Uses istanbul to instrument your aura bundles inside of an SFDX project directory with some special sauce to make them Lightning compatible. Must still be uploaded to Salesforce.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command
